name: My Big Sister Is A Bratty Illusionist
name_original: My Big Sister Is A Bratty Illusionist
description:
In this story you play as Milo who is sent by his mother to get his sister for breakfast. She's an illusionist and sends you into a tiny dungeon.

This was made for RPG Maker Jam #2 in 48-hours. All of the assets were made within the time frame. 

Controls are basic RPG Maker controls, arrow keys to move, shift to dash, space to confirm and ESC for back.
